name: @vrembem/modal
description: A component for changing the mode of a page to complete a critical task. This is usually used in conjunction with the Dialog component to make modal dialogs.

scripts.scripts:compile: mkdirp dist && browserify index.js --debug dist/scripts.js -t [ babelify --global --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] | exorcist dist/scripts.js.map > dist/scripts.js
scripts.scripts:min: mkdirp dist && browserify index.js --debug dist/scripts.min.js -t [ babelify --global --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -p tinyify | exorcist dist/scripts.min.js.map > dist/scripts.min.js
